alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne and central White Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McRae, or 7 miles southwest of Searcy, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Beebe... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Pangburn... Crosby... McRae... Garner... Letona... Albion... Vinity Corner... Clay... Providence... Dewey... Center Hill... Pickens in White County... Armstrong Springs... Plainview in White County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
